name: Copy
description: Copies the selected code.

name: Paste
description: Pastes the selected code.

name: Cut
description: Cut out the selected code.

name: Move Line up
description: Moves selected (cursor position) lines up.

name: Move Line down
description: Moves selected (cursor position) lines down.

name: Delete Lines
description: Deletes selected (cursor position) lines.

name: Duplicate Lines
description: Duplicate selected (cursor position) lines.

name: Insert Cursor below
description: Adds a cursor below the current one.

name: Move to word end
description: Move the cursor to the end of the word. Can be combined with `Shift` to select.

name: Move to word start
description: Move the cursor to the start of the word. Can be combined with `Shift` to select.

name: Rename variable
description: Rename selected (cursor position) variable. Also works for xml/html tags.

name: Goto file …
description: Opens VS Code prompt to search a file.

name: Enter VS Code command …
description: Opens VS Code prompt to enter a command.

name: Format document
description: Format the entire active file. Out-of-the-box support for JavaScript, TypeScript, JSON, HTML and CSS. Other languages work if matching formatters / language extensions are installed.

name: Format selection
description: Format the selected text. Out-of-the-box support for JavaScript, TypeScript, JSON, HTML and CSS. Other languages work if matching formatters / language extensions are installed.

name: Go to Next Problem
description: Jumps to the next problem.

name: Expand Selection
description: Expands the current selection using semantic knowledge.

name: Shrink Selection
description: Shrinks the current selection using semantic knowledge.

name: Close Editor
description: Closes currently active editor

name: Close All Editors
description: Closes all currently opened editors

name: Open Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Show list of configured global key bindings

name: Collapse all open folders
description: Collapses all expanded folders in Explorer when it's in focus
